constantValues: Tracks how frequently constituents donate funds to a nonprofit or a foundation.  All nonprofits and foundations seek to attract as many monthly, recurring, or sustaining gifts or donor commitments as they can.  Other donors routinely give on a one-time basis.  Monthly givers require additional tracking of payments and transaction information, such as payment method, schedules, and in-kind pledge relevance.

definitions.description: Tracks how frequently constituents donate funds to a nonprofit or a foundation.  All nonprofits and foundations seek to attract as many monthly, recurring, or sustaining gifts or donor commitments as they can.  Other donors routinely give on a one-time basis.  Monthly givers require additional tracking of payments and transaction information, such as payment method, schedules, and in-kind pledge relevance.
